result.reason: RDP credential dialog interaction ('More choices') triggers a disconnect/reconnect cycle that crashes mRemoteNG, likely an unhandled COM exception or null reference in the OnDisconnected handler when CredSSP re-auth is initiated.
result.approach: Add null/COM exception guard in RDPEvent_OnDisconnected around the reconnect logic; handle disconnect reason codes that correspond to credential re-selection (e.g. 0xB08/0xB09) gracefully without crashing the host panel.
